description.@value:
Eislaufen
auf der Kunstbahn in Mayrhofen
Eislaufen macht der ganzen Familie Spaß. In der Ferienregion Mayrhofen-Hippach im Zillertal gibt es eine Kunsteislaufbahn - auch Eishockey ist hier möglich.

Location: The artificial ice rink is lokated adjacent to the Erlebnisbad Mayrhofen  (aquatics centre)
Type of ice skating rink: Artificial ice skating rink 
Size: 1500 m²
Cost of using the rink: Children (6 to 15 years): 2,50 € 
                                     Young persons (16 - 18 years): 3,50 €
                                     Adults: Normal price: 5,50, with guest card: 4,50 €
Skates hire: Yes; € 2,50 for children ans 3,50 € for adults 
Lighting: Yes 
Changing rooms: Yes 
Curling on offer: Yes, 2 curling tracks; curling € 4,- culring stick hire: 3,- 
Parking options: Parking available at Erlebnisbad Mayrhofen (aquatics centre) 
Refreshment options: Yes 
Special features: different events (e.g. ice disco); ice hockey available by arrangement
Opening times: form mid-December until mid-March, open daily from 2.00 p.m. until 9.30 a.m.
